name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Ask Haiku Reader to recite a haiku”
”Tell Haiku Reader to read me a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: A haiku is traditionally a Japanese poem consisting of three short lines that do not rhyme. Just ask Alexa to open Haiku Reader and read you a haiku.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
